summary: Jodie Comer has just won her first award for entertainer of the year at the inaugural Stylist Remarkable Women Awards. [5 March...
caption:
Jodie Comer has just won her first award for entertainer of the year at the inaugural Stylist Remarkable Women Awards. [5 March 2019]

“I had so much fun at the @/stylistmagazine awards last night for remarkable women. I was presented an award for entertainer of the year by none other than Fiona Shaw. My colleague, my friend and all time girl crush. Thank you stylist for this lovely honour and for putting together such a glorious event. Congratulations to all the other winners on your hard work and success. I hope you’re all as hungover as I am! X”

Photo credit via @ffaupdates

summary: god one of my favorite things about killing eve is that villanelle is just. like that. we get bits and pieces of her past, but...
body: god one of my favorite things about killing eve is that villanelle is just. like that. we get bits and pieces of her past, but we can never be sure what exactly they mean or how true they are. we get a few vague allusions to something traumatic happening to her, but nothing concrete. and i guess i just really like that: that villanelle is just fucking crazy because that’s who she is. and i know we’ll probably learn more about her past in season two but i’m honestly hoping she remains fairly nebulous. it’s a lot of the fun of her character. every time you think she’s being genuine and opening up, she’s actually just fucking with another character, and by extension the audience. i don’t want that to go away, even as we learn more about her. i like her how she is, and i feel like trying to explain her character with childhood trauma or mental illness would do her a disservice. she’s just nuts man. that’s just how she is.

reblog.comment: god one of my favorite things about killing eve is that villanelle is just. like that. we get bits and pieces of her past, but we can never be sure what exactly they mean or how true they are. we get a few vague allusions to something traumatic happening to her, but nothing concrete. and i guess i just really like that: that villanelle is just fucking crazy because that’s who she is. and i know we’ll probably learn more about her past in season two but i’m honestly hoping she remains fairly nebulous. it’s a lot of the fun of her character. every time you think she’s being genuine and opening up, she’s actually just fucking with another character, and by extension the audience. i don’t want that to go away, even as we learn more about her. i like her how she is, and i feel like trying to explain her character with childhood trauma or mental illness would do her a disservice. she’s just nuts man. that’s just how she is.

trail.content: god one of my favorite things about killing eve is that villanelle is just. like that. we get bits and pieces of her past, but we can never be sure what exactly they mean or how true they are. we get a few vague allusions to something traumatic happening to her, but nothing concrete. and i guess i just really like that: that villanelle is just fucking crazy because that’s who she is. and i know we’ll probably learn more about her past in season two but i’m honestly hoping she remains fairly nebulous. it’s a lot of the fun of her character. every time you think she’s being genuine and opening up, she’s actually just fucking with another character, and by extension the audience. i don’t want that to go away, even as we learn more about her. i like her how she is, and i feel like trying to explain her character with childhood trauma or mental illness would do her a disservice. she’s just nuts man. that’s just how she is.

summary: Speedpaint of my Villaneve piece, the first in a femslash series I’m doing! This is just sort of a date night for them, I guess...
caption:
Speedpaint of my Villaneve piece, the first in a femslash series I’m doing! This is just sort of a date night for them, I guess lol

The next one will be of Watolock (Miss Sherlock/Wato-San) from Miss Sherlock (Literally the best adaptation of Sherlock Holmes I’ve ever seen. Like seriously. Go watch it right now.) I’ll see if I can get some footage of that as well for another speedpaint, in case anyone’s interested!

summary:
Villanelle: thanks, dad
Villanelle: why is everyone staring at me?
Eve: you just called Konstantin 'dad'.
Villanelle: what? no i...
body:
Villanelle: thanks, dad

Villanelle: why is everyone staring at me?

Eve: you just called Konstantin ‘dad’.

Villanelle: what? no i didn’t. i said, 'thanks man’

Konstantin: do you see me as a father figure, Villanelle?

Villanelle: no. if anything i see you as a 'bother’ figure, 'cause you’re always bothering me

Villanelle: no. if anything i see you as a 'bother’ figure, 'cause you’re always bothering me

summary: did you find out there WILL BE a new female assassin, and all i can think about was your fic becoming canon!

summary: So in this scene they stay low on the bed with their feet off of the end? And face to face they have to curl their legs up like...
caption: So in this scene they stay low on the bed with their feet off of the end? And face to face they have to curl their legs up like that? Was this to make it easier for Sandra/Eve to [spoiler] Jodie/Villanelle? The thought of them shimmying up the bed to get more comfortable.

blog.name: dailyvillanelle
blog.title: don’t be pathetic.
blog.description: Welcome to dailyvillanelle! Your #1 source for all things Oksana Astankova (Villanelle) from the BBC America series Killing Eve and the actress who plays her, Jodie Comer. Tracked tags: #dailyvillanelle & #villanelleedit.

summary: Soft Billanelle headcanon: Villanelle will use every opportunity to comb/brush/wash Eve’s hair bc it’s so curly and soft and it...
question: Soft Billanelle headcanon: Villanelle will use every opportunity to comb/brush/wash Eve’s hair bc it’s so curly and soft and it makes her happy bc she never had that opportunity with Anna
answer:
you guys are really coming for me this afternoon.

because villanelle is very conscious of hair care, she scolds eve for even running her hands through it because that creates frizz. she buys eve fancy sulfate free shampoo, special conditioner, and gel because villanelle nearly fainted when she saw that eve uses… head and shoulders. 

sometimes they watch a movie. eve falls asleep and villanelle never does. she runs her fingers softly through eve’s curls and takes in her warmth. she is content.
